snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission has proposed rules to lift advertising restrictions for hedge funds, but the way this looks on paper and the way it will play out are a tad different.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission has proposed rules to lift advertising restrictions for hedge funds, but the way this looks on paper and the way it will play out are a tad different.

headline.main: Pruning Hedge Fund Regulation Without Cultivating Better Rules
headline.print_headline: Pruning Regulation Without Cultivating Better Rules
